com.facebook.litho.dataflow

Class TimingNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.dataflow.ValueNode
      • com.facebook.litho.dataflow.TimingNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeCanFinish

    public class TimingNode
extends ValueNode
implements NodeCanFinish
    A ValueNode that will linearly update its value from 0 to 1.0 over the course of the given duration.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateValue

        public float calculateValue(long frameTimeNanos)
        Description copied from class: ValueNode
        This node should calculate and set a new value based on frame time and its parents (the nodes it depends on). When this is called, it's guaranteed that the parent nodes have already been updated for this frame.
        Specified by:
        calculateValue in class ValueNode

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Description copied from interface: NodeCanFinish
        Called by framework code to determine whether a node is finished. This will only be called on this node when all of its inputs are finished.
        Specified by:
        isFinished in interface NodeCanFinish
        Returns:
        whether this node is finished given that its inputs are finished.
